page.title: 05AN INFANT'S DAY
page.content: I get up at 7 o'clock and I have Weetabix for breakfast.Then I brush my teeth and get dressed.I get into the car and go to school.I take off my coat and go to class.We do some work and go to Assembly,where I sing. We go out to play and after the whistle we have milk and a biscuit and do some more work.When we have our lunch we can choose what we want to eat in the dining room.After lunch we play in the playground.We do alot of work in the afternoon and then we go home at 3.15. At home I like to read a book,go out to play or watch television.I have tea ,then watch television before I have a bath and go to bed.
